The ungrateful favourite a tragedy / written by a person of honour. Southland, Thomas. Person of honour.
[4], 94 p.
Printed by J. Cottrel for Samuel Speed ..., London : 1664.
Perhaps by Thomas Southland. Cf. A. Nicoll, Restoration drama, 1923. Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
